MS MCQs

    Configure Microsoft Teams meetings and calls for inclusion

    »

    1. How do you enable transcription for recorded meetings using the Microsoft Teams admin center?

      Set the Enable live captions option to On.

      Set the Enable live captions option to Switched off but user can override.

      Set the Enable live captions option to Disabled but the user can override.


    2. How can you use PowerShell to configure a background blur policy?

      Create a policy using the Set-CsTeamsBlurMeetingPolicy cmdlet. The blur will automatically be applied.

      Create a policy using the Set-CsTeamsMeetingPolicy cmdlet and set the -VideoFiltersMode parameter to BlurOnly.

      Make sure to create a meeting using the Set-CsTeamsMeeting cmdlet and set the -BlurFiltersMode parameter to BlurOnly.


    3. When using screen sharing mode, what screen sharing options are available?

      Split screen, single applications, or disabled.

      No screen sharing, single application, or disabled.

      Entire screen, single application, and disabled.


    4. Normally, when a meeting participant shares their screen, all participants video streams convert to a thumbnail. This could be a problem for users who need interpreters because they need to be able to clearly see their interpreters. How can those users resolve this?

      They can pin the video of the interpreters.

      They can use the Raise your hand feature.

      They can use Together mode.
